title: Testimony
verses: Mark 5:19 (WEB) — “Go to your house, to your friends, and tell them what great things the Lord has done for you.”
Revelation 12:11 (WEB) — “They overcame… because of the Lamb’s blood and because of the word of their testimony.”
Psalm 66:16 (WEB) — “Come and hear… and I will declare what he has done for my soul.”
1 Peter 3:15 (WEB) — “Be ready to give an answer… with gentleness and respect.”
body: Your story in Christ is a gift for others. Share simply: life before Jesus, how you met Him, and the change He is making. Speak with humility and hope.
prayer: Lord, open doors for my story to point to Your glory. Give me clarity, compassion, and courage to speak. Amen.
